 2014-03872014-04-10,  ,  HC,  , 
ActCanadian Centre on Substance Abuse Act
PrecisAppointment of AUDREY MCFARLANE of Cold Lake, Alberta, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
